DOC.brief_summary: Phase I Clinical Trial Comparison Pharmacokinetic Characteristics Vorico Injection 200mg ( Voriconazole ) Vfend® IV 200mg Single Dose Crossover Intravenous Infusion Healthy Volunteers
DOC.brief_title: Phase I Clinical Trial Comparison Pharmacokinetic Characteristics Vorico Injection 200mg ( Voriconazole ) Vfend® IV 200mg Single Dose Crossover Intravenous Infusion Healthy Volunteers
DOC.detailed_description: To healthy volunteer subject twenty four ( 24 ) , follow treatment administer dose period inject wash-out period minimum 7days . Treatment A ( Test Drug ) : Vorico Injection 200mg ( Voriconazole ) Single Dose Treatment B ( Reference Drug ) : Vfend® IV 200mg Single Dose Pharmacokinetic blood sample collect 24hrs . Safety pharmacokinetic assess .
DOC.criteria: 1 . A healthy person whose age 19 55 screening test 2 . Whose weight 55 kg , BMI 18.5 30.0 screening test . ( BMI ( kg/m2 ) = weight ( kg ) / { height ( ) } 2 ) 3. Who completely inform understand clinical trial , voluntarily participate , sign follow give instruction 4. Who proven fit clinical trial follow physical examination , ECG ( electrocardiogram ) , clinical laboratory test , medical examination 5. Who agree birth control test A male vasectomy follow clinically proven contraceptive methods* list , agree donate sperm test * Clinically proven contraceptive method : intrauterine device ( ex . Lippes Loop , Minera ) , chemical contraceptive ( spermicide ) use physical contraceptive method ( male female ) , contraceptive implant ( ex . Implanon ) , tubal ligation laparoscopy ( common method tubal ligation ) A woman childbearing age agree constant use medically disproven Dual Protection method** spermicides except hormonal contraceptive , also agree breastfeed . A Dual Protection method : use condom , Intrauterine Contraceptive Device , diaphragm , cervical cap , case sexual partner vasectomy 3 month ago ( date initial screening ) sexual partner medically diagnose sterile . 1 . A person history clinically significant cardiovascular , respiratory , liver , kidney , endocrine system , immune system , urinary system disease , bloodtumor disease , mental illness . 2. Who history hypersensitivity reaction antifungal drug include voriconazole similar series excipient ingredient ( aspirin , antibiotic , etc . ) 3. Who genetics issue galactose intolerance , Lapp lactose deficiency , glucosegalactose malabsorption 4. Who history gastrointestinal disease ( Crohn 's disease , ulcer , acute chronic pancreatitis , etc . ) gastrointestinal surgery ( simple appendectomy herniotomy ) 5 . A person whose electrocardiogram value include QTc > 440 msec , PR < 110 msec PR > 200 msec , QRS < 60 msec QRS > 110 msec screening , show clinically significant opinion . 6. Who fall follow result 1 . AST , ALT exceed 1.5x upper limit normal range 2 . Total bilirubin exceed 1.5x upper limit normal range 7. Who show vital sign value 140 mmHg less 90 mmHg systolic pressure 100 mmHg less 60 mmHg diastolic blood pressure 8. Who history drug abuse show positive result urinary drug screen 9. Who take prescribe drug , medicinal plant within 2 week first day dose take overthecounter drug vitamin supplement within 1 week ( , condition meet , still participate clinical test researcher 's judgment ) 10. Who take investigational drug bioequivalence drug within 3 month first day dose 11. Who participate whole blood donation within 2 month first dose , platelet donation within 1 month . Who receive blood month first day dose 12. Who constantly drink alcohol ( 21 units/week , 1 unit = 10 g pure alcohol ) stop drinking alcohol clinical test . 13. Who smoke 10 cigarette per day , quit smoking hospitalize 14. Who absorb caffeinated drink ( coffee , tea ( black green tea ) , soda , coffee flavor milk , energy drink , etc . ) stop absorb 24 hour hospitalization discharge 15. Who take drug metabolism drug like barbital drug inhibit activate metabolism drug , take one follow drug : St. John 's Wort , rifabutin , rifampicin , carbamazepine , phenobarbital , highdose ritonavir , terfenadine , astemizole , cisapride , pimozide , quinidine , sirolimus , ergot , alkaloid ( ergotamine , dihydroergotamine ) , efavirenz 16. Who food ( especially grapefruit product contain grapefruit ) influence drug absorption , distribution , metabolism , excretion within 7 day first day dosage 17 . A woman pregnant , show positive result serum/urine test , breastfeed
